languages.text: "Смеете мне перечить?" {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет навигатора встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".

traits.locale_text: "Смеете мне перечить?" {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет Навигатора встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."
languages.original_text: "Смеете мне перечить?" {n}Спокойный голос Кассии заставляет навигатора встрепенуться, но она этого не замечает — ее взгляд направлен лишь на вас.{/n} "Я больше не желаю бояться, {name}. Служить Дому, что предавал меня из раза в раз. Или использовал как пустышку. Послушную замену Тисифоны. Я... ухожу. Вместе с вами, {name}. И отрекаюсь от титула новатора".

Or serve the House that betrayed me time and time again. Used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

languages.text: 「あたくしに逆らうというのですか？」{n}カシアの穏やかな声に航宙士はたじろぐ。それを意に介さず、カシアはあなただけを見つめている。{/n}「あたくしはもう、怯えたくはありません、{name}様。あたくしを裏切った家門に再び仕える気もありません。あたくしを魂なき操り人形として扱った家門なんて。従順なティシフォンの代替品として扱った家門なんて。あたくしは…行きます。{name}様、あなたと共に。ノベイターの肩書きを捨てます」
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしに逆らうというのですか？」{n}カシアの穏やかな声に航宙士はたじろぐ。それを意に介さず、カシアはあなただけを見つめている。{/n}「あたくしはもう、怯えたくはありません、{name}様。あたくしを裏切った家門に再び仕える気もありません。あたくしを魂なき操り人形として扱った家門なんて。従順なティシフォンの代替品として扱った家門なんて。あたくしは…行きます。{name}様、あなたと共に。ノベイターの肩書きを捨てます」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你竟敢反对我？”{n}卡西娅平静的声音让那个导航者不由得退了一步，但她并没有留意其他人。此刻，她的眼中只有你。{/n}“我不想再害怕下去了，{name}，我也不想再为我的家族效力了。他们一次次背叛我，把我当成没有灵魂的傀儡，把我看做提西福涅忠顺的继承人。我要……走了，我要和你一起走，{name}。我在此放弃我的大族长之位。”
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢反对我？”{n}卡西娅平静的声音让那个导航者不由得退了一步，但她并没有留意其他人。此刻，她的眼中只有你。{/n}“我不想再害怕下去了，{name}，我也不想再为我的家族效力了。他们一次次背叛我，把我当成没有灵魂的傀儡，把我看做提西福涅忠顺的继承人。我要……走了，我要和你一起走，{name}。我在此放弃我的大族长之位。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous osez me contredire ? » {n}La voix pourtant calme de Cassia fait tressaillir le navigateur, mais elle ne semble même pas s'en rendre compte tant elle n'a d'yeux que pour vous.{/n} « Je ne veux plus avoir peur, {name}. Je ne veux plus servir la maison qui m'a trahie à de multiples reprises. Qui s'est servie de moi comme d'une marionnette. Et qui ne voyait en moi que la docile remplaçante de Tisiphone. Je... pars. Avec vous, {name}. Je renonce au titre de Novator. »
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: « Vous osez me contredire ? » {n}La voix pourtant calme de Cassia fait tressaillir le navigateur, mais elle ne semble même pas s'en rendre compte tant elle n'a d'yeux que pour vous.{/n} « Je ne veux plus avoir peur, {name}. Je ne veux plus servir la maison qui m'a trahie à de multiples reprises. Qui s'est servie de moi comme d'une marionnette. Et qui ne voyait en moi que la docile remplaçante de Tisiphone. Je... pars. Avec vous, {name}. Je renonce au titre de Novator. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Cómo osas oponerte a mí?». {n}La voz tranquila de Cassia hace que el Navegante retroceda, pero ella no lo ve, pues sus ojos están fijos en ti.{/n} «No deseo seguir viviendo con miedo, {name}. Ni tampoco servir a la casa que me ha traicionado una vez tras otra, que me ha utilizado como una marioneta sin voluntad, como una sustituta sumisa de Tisiphone. Voy a... abandonarla. Me marcho con usted, {name}. Renuncio a mi título de Novator».
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo osas oponerte a mí?». {n}La voz tranquila de Cassia hace que el Navegante retroceda, pero ella no lo ve, pues sus ojos están fijos en ti.{/n} «No deseo seguir viviendo con miedo, {name}. Ni tampoco servir a la casa que me ha traicionado una vez tras otra, que me ha utilizado como una marioneta sin voluntad, como una sustituta sumisa de Tisiphone. Voy a... abandonarla. Me marcho con usted, {name}. Renuncio a mi título de Novator».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, Euch gegen mich zu stellen?" {n}Cassias ruhige Stimme lässt die Navigatorin zusammenzucken, was sie aber gar nicht bemerkt. Sie hat nur Augen für dich.{/n} "Ich will keine Angst mehr haben, {name}. Und dem Haus nicht mehr dienen, dass mich wieder und wieder betrogen hat. Das mich als seelenlose Puppe benutzt hat. Als gehorsamen Ersatz für Tisiphone. Ich ... gehe. Ich gehe mit Euch, {name}. Ich lege meinen Titel als Novatorin ab."
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, Euch gegen mich zu stellen?" {n}Cassias ruhige Stimme lässt die Navigatorin zusammenzucken, was sie aber gar nicht bemerkt. Sie hat nur Augen für dich.{/n} "Ich will keine Angst mehr haben, {name}. Und dem Haus nicht mehr dienen, dass mich wieder und wieder betrogen hat. Mich als seelenlose Puppe benutzt. Als gehorsamen Ersatz für Tisiphone. Ich ... gehe. Ich gehe mit Euch, {name}. Ich lege meinen Titel als Novatorin ab."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne cüretle bana karşı çıkarsın?" {n}Cassia'nın sakin ses tonu yüzünden Rotacı irkilse de Cassia, gözleri sadece seni gördüğünden bunu fark etmiyor.{/n} "Artık korkmak istemiyorum {name}. Bana defalarca ihanet eden Hane'ye hizmet etmek de istemiyorum. Artık Tisiphone'ye vekâlet eden, itaatkâr ve ruhsuz kukla rolünü üstlenmek istemiyorum. Ben... Gidiyorum. Seninle geleceğim {name}. Rota Reisliği makamından feragat ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "How dare you oppose me?" {n}Cassia's calm voice makes the Navigator flinch but she does not notice, for she only has eyes for you.{/n} "I do not want to be afraid anymore, {name}. Or to serve the House that has betrayed me time and again. That has used me as a soulless puppet. As Tisiphone's obedient substitute. I am... leaving. Leaving with you, {name}. I renounce my Novator's title."

traits.locale_text: "Ne cüretle bana karşı çıkarsın?" {n}Cassia'nın sakin ses tonu yüzünden Rotacı irkilse de, Cassia bunu fark etmiyor çünkü gözleri sadece sana dönmüş durumda.{/n} "Artık korkmak istemiyorum {name}. Bana defalarca ihanet eden Haneye hizmet etmek de istemiyorum. Artık Tisiphone'ye vekâleten itaatkâr ve ruhsuz bir kukla rolünü üstlenmek istemiyorum. Yani... Gidiyorum. Seninle gidiyorum {name}. Rota Reisi makamından feragat ediyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
